mapper.select:
select app.id as id , app.reserver5 as custType , app.name as name, app.idno as idno , checks.shr as shr, approve.spsj as shsj, TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute,approve.spsj,app.sqfqsj) as shsc, app.rzje as rzje, app.rzqx as rzqx, app.sfbl as sfbl, app.sqdzt as sqdzt, app.reserver7 as fkrq from t_leasing_app app left join t_leasing_check checks on app.id=checks.id left join t_leasing_approve approve on app.id=approve.id where 1=1
and app.sqdzt in
#{item}
and app.id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{id}),'%')
and app.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and date_format(app.sqfqsj,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{sqfqrq}
order by sqfqsj desc
select * from SYS_BRANCH where 1=1 and id=#{jxsid}
mapper.sql: id, producttype, productname, jxsid, lcj, gpsfee, gzs, fwf, bxf, ybf, ghf, jzf, rzsxf, clyh, ppcx, clys, scs, cjh, fdjh, pgj, bzj, sfbl, rzje, rzqx, name, idtype, idno, mobile, qq, weixin, xl, hyzk, xxxdz, zsqs, tzr, hjss, jtcy, lbdsc, fcdz1, fczt1, fcdz2, fczt2, ccsl, ccpp, cczt, czr1dwmc, czr1dwlx, czr1sshy, czr1dwdh, czr1zj, czr1zwmc, czr1dwdz, czr1ysr, czr1nsr, poname, poidtype, poidno, pomobile, poqq, poweixin, podwmc, podwlx, posshy, podwdh, pozj, pozwmc, podwdz, poysr, ponsr, czr2lx, czr2name, czr2idtype, czr2idno, czr2mobile, czr2qq, czr2weixin, czr2brgx, czr2dwmc, czr2dwlx, czr2sshy, czr2dwdh, czr2zj, czr2zwmc, czr2dwdz, czr2ysr, czr2nsr, lxr1name, lxr1mobile, lxr1gx, lxr1dz, lxr1sfzdgc, lxr2name, lxr2mobile, lxr2gx, lxr2dz, lxr2sfzdgc, jtfzyhqkje, jtfzyhdqkhk, jtfzp2pqkje, jtfzp2pqkyhk, jtfzdbqkje, jtfzdbqkyhk, jtfzxykqkje, jtfzxykqkyhk, jtfzqqqkje, jtfzqqqkyhk, jtfzpyqkje, jtfzpyqkyhk, jtfzzcgsqkje, jtfzzcgsqkyhk, jtfzze, jtfzzhke, sqdzt, sqfqr, sqfqsj, refundacctno, refundbankno, contractid, cph, confirmdate, reserver1, reserver2, reserver3, reserver4, reserver5, reserver6, reserver7, reserver8, reserver9, reserver10
mapper.select:
select a.producttype, a.productname, a.ppcx, a.reserver5, a.name, a.idno, a.sqfqr, c.shr, p.spr, date_format(a.sqfqsj,'%Y-%m-%d') as sqfqsj, date_format(p.spsj,'%Y-%m-%d') as spsj, a.rzje, a.gpsfee, a.fwf, a.gzs, a.rzqx, a.sfbl/100 as sfbl, prod.rate/100 as rate, a.sqdzt, prod.yhk as wyyhk, a.hyzk, p.fkfjtj, p.shyyj, p.qxr1yj
from t_leasing_app a
left join t_leasing_check c on a.id=c.id
left join t_leasing_approve p on a.id=p.id
left join t_product prod on prod.productname=a.producttype and prod.productseq=a.productname and prod.periods=a.rzqx
where 1=1
and a.sqdzt in
#{item}
and a.id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{id}),'%')
and a.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and date_format(a.sqfqsj,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{sqfqrq}

select
from t_leasing_app where 1=1
and sqdzt in
#{item}
and id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{id}),'%')
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and date_format(sqfqsj,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{sqfqrq}
order by sqfqsj desc

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select * from t_gps_lvl where FIND_IN_SET(id, (select lvls from t_branch_gps_lvl where branchid=#{branchId}
and (minlvlamt<=#{rzje} and maxlvlamt>#{rzje}) )) order by lvlamt,xsj

select a.id, a.sqdzt, b.branchname, b.openbankname, b.openbankno, a.name, a.idno, a.refundbankno, a.refundacctno, a.rzje, a.reserver1, a.reserver2, a.reserver3, a.rzqx, a.fwf, d.yhk from t_leasing_app a left join sys_branch b on a.jxsid=b.id left join t_product d on a.producttype=d.productname and a.productname=d.productseq and a.rzqx=d.periods inner join t_tmpexp c on a.id=c.tranid where c.sessionid=#{sessionid} order by c.idx asc

select a.id, a.name, a.sqfqr, a.rzje, a.rzqx, b.rate, a.rzsxf, a.reserver1 as gpsfee, a.reserver1-a.reserver2 as gpsjw, a.reserver2 as jxsfy, a.reserver3 as pgf, a.fwf, b.yhk from t_leasing_app a left join t_product b on a.producttype=b.productname and a.productname=b.productseq and a.rzqx=b.periods inner join t_tmpexp c on a.id=c.tranid where c.sessionid=#{sessionid} order by c.idx asc

select a.*, b.rate, b.periods, b.yhk from t_leasing_app a left join t_product b on a.producttype=b.productname and a.productname=b.productseq and a.rzqx=b.periods inner join t_tmpexp c on a.id=c.tranid where c.sessionid=#{sessionid} order by c.idx asc
